biography_text: CROWLEY, Joseph,  a Representative from New York; born in New York, New York County, N.Y., March 16, 1962; graduated from Power Memorial High School, New York, N.Y., 1981; B.A., Queens College, City University of New York, Flushing, N.Y., 1985; member of the New York state assembly, 1986-1998; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixth and to the nine succeeding Congresses (January 3, 1999-present); chair, House Democratic Caucus (One Hundred Fifteenth Congress).
place_of_birth: New York, New York County, N.Y.

post_secondary_degrees.institution: Queens College, City University of New York, Flushing, N.Y.
